thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text in the HTML to analyze the content.
observation: xAudits - Smart Contract Audit for Solidity and Rust  Smart Contract Audit Services Company Request a Quote Audit Rust Solidity Secure Your Web3 Ecosystem Are you looking for smart contract audit services? At xAudits, our team of experts can help you review your smart contracts for security vulnerabilities and potential exploits, by employing cutting-edge security research paired with an attacker's mindset to minimize risk and reinforce your code's reliability. Our expertise covers reverse engineering, cryptography, virtualization, malware behavior, and software exploit analysis. 4.9 | Excellent ~ Review Us! Talk to an Expert SC Audits Languages 2 deep-dive code reviews Initial version Updated version after 1st review Stress Testing Categorized Issues Detection Issues Fixing Solutions Supported Chains EVM & Non-EVM MultiversX Ethereum Solana BNB Polygon Avalanche Near Algorand Tezos Casper Cosmos Polkadot Fantom EOS Smart Contracts Variety Adapting to any type Launchpad Crowdfunding DeFi Dex Lending Order Book Liquid Staking Staking Farming NFT Marketplace NFT Distribution Lottery Attestation Multisig Others Projects Get a Free Quote Reported Issues OneDex 61 X-Leverage 14 Blok 13 VestaX Finance 4 SuperRareBears 7 Sense4FIT 12 Spotlight Interested in an Audit? Ever since we met the Sense4FIT team during their incubation on BHero Launchpad, we noticed their interest in security. We are glad to have been able to audit their Vesting Smart Contracts At the core of OneDex lies the security of its smart contracts. They have partnered with us for a series of smart contract audits VestaX Finance aims to become one of the core liquid staking providers on MultiversX. We crossed paths before their BLOK is a project focused on tokenizing real estate, with the goal of making property investment opportunities accessible to all. During the code analysis of their Staking Smart Sontract code quality solid tests Super Rare Bears had their Farm Smart Contract Secure Get an Audit About Us Check Contact T&C Media Kit Social Media BH Network Linkedin Telegram Discord Â© 2024 Terms and Conditions.
